How to Process Incoming REPS Applications
Follow the steps in the table below to process all incoming
VA Forms 21P-8924
.
Step
Action

If
yes
, go to the next step.
If
no

follow the instructions in

go to Step 3.

after

Were attempts to obtaining the missing information by telephone successful?
If
yes
,
disregard the remaining steps in this table, and
follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 3.B.1.b
for establishing the appropriate EP.
If
no
, go to the next step.
4
Establish EP 290,
REPS
, using the appropriate payee code, if no REPS-related EP is pending.
5
Prepare and send a development letter to the claimant that requests the missing information.
Add the
Form Incomplete
tracked item.
Allow the claimant 30 days to respond.
6
Did the claimant provide the missing information within 30 days?
If
yes
,
disregard the remaining steps in this table, and
follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 3.B.1.b
for establishing the appropriate EP.
If
no
, go to the next step.
7
Close the tracked item added in Step 5, if it remains open.
8
Deny the claim for REPS benefits.
9
Change the EP 290 to EP 400,
Correspondence
.
10
Send a decision notice to the claimant that meets the requirements set forth in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.B
.
11
Upload the decision notice to the appropriate eFolder, using the proper document label.
12
Clear the EP 400.
